version_description:
Max for Live Synthetic control device downloadable from https://synthetic.app
14 bit NRPN MIDI control

Fixed Note On/Off MIDI events output.
Bug fixes.

Bug fixes
UI usability improvements
Unified iPhone and iPad layout
Fixed broken LFO2
Note transpose
Please download the new Max 4 Live Synthetic control device version 1302 from http://www.synthetic.app

Self-running / play-along demo
UI usability improvements
More precise velocity sensing
Fullscreen on modern iPhones
Sequencer decoupled from screen updates
Improved text font
Bug fixes
